feature_model.name: IntelligentTutoringSystem
feature_model.feature_tree: :r IntelligentTutoring(IntelligentTutoring) :m Tutoring(Tutoring) :g (_r_1_5) [1,*] : tutoring_simulation(tutoring_simulation) : tutoring_simulation2(tutoring_simulation2) :o Tutoring_lecture(Tutoring_lecture) :m Feedback(Feedback) :m Advice(Advice) :o Grading(Grading) :o Result_Monitoring(Result_Monitoring) :o User_Authentication(User_Authentication) :g (_r_4_11) [1,*] : Student(Student) : Instructor(Instructor)
